name: 17th World Congress on General Pediatrics & Adolescent Medicine
content: Welcome to the 17th World Congress on General Pediatrics & Adolescent Medicine, proudly hosted by Conference Series. With over 15 years of experience in organizing groundbreaking medical conferences, we are thrilled to invite you to this prestigious gathering of Pediatricians, Pediatric Surgeons, Neonatologists, Adolescent Medicine Specialists, Pediatric Nurses in the vibrant city of Toronto, Canada.
